item.title: This AI Startup From Harvard Students Is Arming Soldiers For Electronic Warfare
item.description: Distributed Spectrum has developed tiny AI-powered sensors to help the U.S. military locate enemy troops and drones by their radio emissions.

item.title: Alphabet Spins Off Taara, A Laser-Powered Starlink Rival
item.description: With satellite internet facing new competition, Taara’s laser-based technology offers a different path to global connectivity.

item.title: Apple iOS 18.3.2 iPhone Warning: Latest Update Causing Problems
item.description: The latest iPhone software is barely a week old, but some users are saying it’s causing key software to break.
